title: Phone: Using the Keypad Feature
body:
Phone: Using the Keypad Feature¶

Keypad offers a way to make phone calls to any number without ever leaving the Maha Platform.
This can be done from a cell phone number or a Maha phone number connected to one of the programs from your organization.
To make a call, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon to pull up Phone in a side bar

  2. Click Keypad in the bottom ribbon

  3. Click the dropdown menu at the top to switch the phone number

  4. Enter a phone number in the keypad

  5. Click

  6. Choose to Call with cell phone or Call with Maha phone

  7. Once the recipient picks up, you will be offered three options:

    • Click transfer and select a user to transfer the call to

    • Click device to transfer the phone call to the other phone option (cell or Maha)

    • Click sms to send a send the recipient a text message
